    level="1"
    right="Feat 20"
    pfs=""
>
[Cunning Trickster Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3433) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 78</row>

**Archetypes** [Druid](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=6), [Wizard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=12) (Level 20)

**Prerequisites**
[Druid Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=701) or [Wizard Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=742)

</column>

---

Your mask carries the legacy of Verdant Spider, the Speaker of Needs, allowing you to deceive and outwit your foes. You can attempt to [Feint](/Actions.aspx?ID=48) a target from up to 30 feet away, and if you succeed or critically succeed in your Feint attempt, the target of your Feint takes a –2 circumstance penalty to saving throws against your spells until the start of your next turn. If you don't have the [Conceal Spell](/Feats.aspx?ID=640) feat, you gain it as a bonus feat, allowing you to disguise your spellcasting from others' eyes. If you already have the Conceal Spell feat, you can use Conceal Spell once per round as a free action instead of as a single action.

<title level="2">Masks of the Magic Warriors</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #174: Shadows of the Ancients](/Sources.aspx?ID=115) pg. 78</row>

In becoming Jatembe's new Magic Warriors, the heroes have unlocked secrets of magical potential that none have reached since the earliest Ten Magic Warriors walked the plazas of the Magaambya.

 On reaching 20th level, the heroes should have the option of taking one of these archetype feats, based on the type of animal they chose for their mask when they first created it in _Pathfinder Adventure Path #169: Kindled Magic_. These options are each themed to one of Jatembe's magic warriors, but if a hero's mask doesn't fit with a specific animal from this list or the player feels their animal embodies a different effect from the list, feel free to reflavor the feat names to fit the hero's spirit face. For instance, the Cunning Trickster mask could easily be a rodent or a fox, not just a spider.

**Related Feats**: [Emancipator's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3434), [Grand Medic's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3435), [Protective Spirit Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3436), [Sky Master Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3437), [Stalking Feline Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3438), [Storyteller's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3439), [Thick Hide Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3440), [Tireless Guide's Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3441), [Vigilant Mask](/Feats.aspx?ID=3442)
name: Cunning Trickster Mask
